name: Back to Saturn X Episode 1: Get Out Of My Stations
description: Pwad file from Doomworld. Requires either the DOOM 2 or the Freedoom phase 2 iwad to play.

files.doom2: N/A:Please select either the DOOM 2 or Freedoom phase 2 iwad file.

content:
files:
- doom2: N/A:Please select either the DOOM 2 or Freedoom phase 2 iwad file.
- btsx: http://youfailit.net/pub/idgames/levels/doom2/megawads/btsx_e1.zip
game:
  args: -deh btsx_e1.deh
  files:
  - btsx_e1a.wad
  - btsx_e1b.wad
  main_file: doom2
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $btsx
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $doom2
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/btsx_e1a.wad
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/btsx_e1b.wad
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/btsx_e1.deh
